channel.title: akrehl | Projects & Blog
channel.description: Recent content on akrehl | Projects & Blog

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello World!

I hope you will find something valuable for you on my site.

Thanks for passing by!

item.title: Projects
item.description:
The speed of development and innovations on the web platform, at the time of writing, is enormous. There are a number of new things we all heard of. I am following some of them with detail.

I am not YET an active part of the open source community, but this will change! I already have some ideas on my todo list.

All my future projects will be listed here.

item.title: Contributions
item.description:
Currently I am very busy and have not started to give back to the wonderful open source community. I am actively watching some interesting projects I would like to contribute to in the near future.

All my valuable contributions in the future will be listed here.

item.title: About Me
item.description:
I’m Adrian Krehl and currently a student in applied computer science at the Hochschule Hannover, Germany. Additionally I am working in a small software company. I love technology and coding in a variety of languages both at work and in my spare time. When Iâ€™m not coding, I try to spend time with my family and friends.

What this site is about and what not

I did make this site for my own purpose. Mainly for giving me a good platform for testing and sharing new ideas and code with the community. I do not want to label the site to any specific topic or programming language. I am just to interested in all of them ðŸ˜ƒ . I consider myself a beginner in software engineering, so please do not copy and paste any code without a closer look. Take a look at my license.

As you may already noticed, I am not a native english speaker. Please be kind, I give my very best! Opinions are my own and not the views of my employer.
